name: processtemplate
description: Deploys an XML Process to VSTS
author: Martin Hinshelwood

inputs.name: account
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Service Organisation URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the VSTS instance to deploy the Template too. e.g. https://myaccount.visualstudio.com

inputs.name: accesstoken
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal access token for that instance of VSTS

inputs.name: matchProcessTemplates
inputs.label: Process Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search for one or more process templates to upload. Support wildcards.
